query:
SELECT r.*, pt.txid 
FROM pix_transactions pt
LEFT JOIN recharges r ON r.transactionId = pt.txid
WHERE pt.customerId = (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE pin = 7) 
  AND pt.amount = 233
ORDER BY pt.createdAt DESC

LEFT JOIN recharges r ON r.transactionId = pt.txid
WHERE pt.customerId = (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE pin = 7) 
  AND pt.amount = 233
